source: TEXT_HEAVNZ218_01787_SEQ_00<tab>The Vath Hungerer is casting furtive glances in the direction of Mare's Oath.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ218_01787_SEQ_00<tab>ヴァスの塚のウマソウは、メアズオウス遺跡を気にしているようだ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ218_01787_SEQ_01<tab>The Hungerer describes to you a tree that grows on a raised area in front of Mare's Oath. The fruit of that tree, she explains, is beyond compare─the riper the better. The ripest fruit falls from its branches to the ground beneath. She asks that you gather three of these fruits for her.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ218_01787_SEQ_01<tab>ウマソウに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8ACC01 /var>を拾ってくるよう頼まれた。高地ドラヴァニアのチョコボの森で、「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8ACC01 /var>」を3つ入手しよう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ218_01787_SEQ_02<tab>You find the tree where the Hungerer said it would be. You collect the fruit as requested, their sweet, overripe odor hanging about you. Take them back to the waiting Hungerer at Loth ast Vath.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ218_01787_SEQ_02<tab><var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8ACC01 /var>を入手した。ヴァスの塚の「ウマソウ」に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8ACC01 /var>」を渡そう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ218_01787_SEQ_03<tab>The Hungerer is elated to receive the fruit, but Cibleroit nearby regards them with disgust. This occasional difficulty in seeing eye-to-compound-eye is one of the many elements of individuality that brings variety to life in the Nonmind.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ218_01787_SEQ_03<tab>ウマソウに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8ACC01 /var>を渡した。彼女は熟れた<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8ACC01 /var>がたまらないらしいが、気持ち悪いと思っているグナース族もいるようだ。これも個性を持ったグナース族ならではなのだろう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ218_01787_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the fruit to the Vath Hungerer.
TEXT_HEAVNZ218_01787_UMASOU_000_000<tab>Fruit. Delicious fruit. The mere thought of it makes our mandibles itch. <click> <click>
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ218_01787_UMASOU_000_000シシシシシ……思い出すだけで、唾液が溢れ出してくるわ。
私のとてもネバネバとした自慢の唾液が滝のように……。
あなた、採ってきてくれないかしら？

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ218_01787_UMASOU_000_001<tab>Do you know the high ground near Mare's Oath? A great tree grows there. Its fruit is delicious. The ripest fruit falls to the ground, ready to be eaten. <click> <click> Please fetch us three of these fruits.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ218_01787_UMASOU_000_001「メアズオウス遺跡」手前の高台から、
地面に落ちた「」を、
3つばかり持ってきてほしいの……シシシシシ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ218_01787_UMASOU_000_010<tab>Delicious fruit. Ripe fruit. Would you fetch us the fruit? Near Mare's Oath. The great tree.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ218_01787_UMASOU_000_010「メアズオウス遺跡」手前の高台から、
地面に落ちた「」を、
3つばかり持ってきてほしいの……シシシシシ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ218_01787_CIBLEROIT_100_011<tab>Why do you love that fruit so much?
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ218_01787_CIBLEROIT_100_011<tab>シシシシシ……あれの何が、そんなにいいんだか。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ218_01787_UMASOU_000_020<tab>We smell the fruit! <click> <click> And it makes our mandibles itch!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ218_01787_UMASOU_000_020「メアズオウス遺跡」手前の高台から、
地面に落ちた「」を、
3つばかり持ってきてほしいの……シシシシシ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ218_01787_UMASOU_000_021<tab>So sweet and so soft... <click> <click> These fruits are amazing. Thank you, generous hunter.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ218_01787_UMASOU_000_021シシシシシ……嗚呼、なんてウマソウなの！
嗅覚を刺激する腐臭に、ジュクジュクと崩れそうな柔らかさ！
まさに至高の果実……ありがとう、感謝するわ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ218_01787_CIBLEROIT_000_022<tab>We cannot understand why you like this fruit. <click> <click> The smell is disgusting and the texture is worse than disgusting.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ218_01787_CIBLEROIT_000_022やはり共感できない……シシシシシ。
もはや腐りかけた実なんて、気持ち悪いだけだ……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ218_01787_UMASOU_000_023<tab>We pity you. Your life is poorer for your bad taste. But that is well, for it means more fruit for us! <click> <click> <click> Being Nonmind is not always bad, we think.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ218_01787_UMASOU_000_023こんなにウマい食べ物を、食べることができないなんて！
やはり私たちは、「分かたれし者たち」ということね……。
